description:
There are some incorrect spellings in the below files:
  nova/etc/nova/rootwrap.conf
    #LIne10: # explicitely specify a full path (separated by ',')
  
  nova/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py
    #Line1961: Missing paths are ignored, unless explicitely stated not to...
 
  nova/nova/objects/instance_group.py
    #Line138: # field explicitely, we prefer to raise an Exception so the developer...

  nova/nova/objects/pci_device.py
    #Line137: # obj_what_changed, set it explicitely...

I think the word "explicitely" should be spelled as "explicitly".
title: Error spelling of 'explicitely'

comments.content:
There are some incorrect spellings in the below files:
  nova/etc/nova/rootwrap.conf
    #LIne10: # explicitely specify a full path (separated by ',')
  
  nova/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py
    #Line1961: Missing paths are ignored, unless explicitely stated not to...
 
  nova/nova/objects/instance_group.py
    #Line138: # field explicitely, we prefer to raise an Exception so the developer...

  nova/nova/objects/pci_device.py
    #Line137: # obj_what_changed, set it explicitely...

I think the word "explicitely" should be spelled as "explicitly".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jup-fnst

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/232827
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: Is this bug being resolved? If not, then can I do it?

comments.content: Namrata: Yeah, this bug is already resolved.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gabor.antal

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/232827
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=712366f7614f4d85bf36515c13a0e5b7a5b038c8
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 712366f7614f4d85bf36515c13a0e5b7a5b038c8
Author: JuPing <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Oct 9 00:06:35 2015 +0800

    Fix the bug of "Error spelling of 'explicitely'"
    
    The word "explicitely" should be spelled as "explicitly".
    So it is changed.
    
    (df) Ran spell-check on entire file and fixed a few more
    misspellings.
    
    Change-Id: I25d2accc2e0a1aaff71011944a62dadceb508b47
    Closes-Bug: #1501202
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
